MOUNTAIN E-BIKES

If you need an entry mountain and commuter bike at the same time.

> homie - $1,999
mountain commuter e -bike
The Nireeka Homie is an affordably priced full suspension eMTB with an eye-catching custom frame design, carbon fiber frame and components keep weight remarkably low for an ebike, available in three sizes to fit a wide range of riders, available online-only with shipping to most countries around the globe.

Fat E-Bikes

Most powerful, fastest and unique

> homie - $1,999
mountain commuter e -bike
This carbon fiber, high-powered on two wheels and a tank on the trails. Surprisingly, the bike is very customizable, giving you your option of components, electronics, and even color. Riding off-road, the bike feels like a tank, in a very good way. The 1000w motor really made it easy to bound up hills and sort of ignore almost any incline.

Trail E-Bike

Award-winner pro trail E-Bike, in case you want a bike that doesn't let you down whatsoever!

> homie - $1,999
mountain commuter e -bike
Nireeka has upped the ante most ambitious ebikes to date. The Sierra and Nyx are a pair of lightweight, competitively priced, full-suspension off-roaders featuring high-quality components and Nireeka l s gorgeous custom carbon frames. MOTOR BATTERY RANGE
nireeka as reviwed by the press
Workcation
Nireeka Prime Review: High-powered parade on two wheels

Nireeka made a big splash on the E-bike scene with the launch of the Nireeka Prime. This carbon fiber, high-powered head-turner is a parade on two wheels and a tank on the trails. Surprisingly, the bike is very customizable, giving you your option of components, electronics, and even color.

electrek
electrek.co
Nireeka's powerful, carbon-framed Prime e-fatbike is a beauty

There's really nobody in the ebike world I can think of that makes bikes like Nireeka. These guys aren't interested in stealth, or retro, or making bikes that look like anyone else's. They work exclusively with their own carbon-fiber frames, which feature strangely flowing sci-fi designs with twisting edges and curves and angles in a style of their very own.

newatlas
newatlas.com
Nireeka Prime 1.5kW high-power 37mph e-bike enters the ring

The bike’s carbon monocoque frame is certainly a unique head-turner. And while it doesn’t offer suspension, it at least rides on 4-inch fat tires that should add some comfort back in to the ride. The Prime’s mid-drive motor is capable of propelling the bike up to 37.5mph (60 km/h), according to the company

electricbikereview
electricbikereview.com
Nireeka is back with hardtail e-bike: PRIME!

New NIREEKA PRIME hardtail electric bike is not taking any suggestions from current e-bike design trends! Nireeka is one of a kind fluid shaped electric creation with mid-motor power levels that will satisfy Europeans with 250-watt regulation model and e-bikers from the USA with 1000 watts motor model.
